items.sentence: Tom said that he knew he might be allowed to do that today.
Tom never permitted Mary to play the piano after 10:00 p.m.
Tom nodded as if he understood what Mary was talking about.
Tom now knows that what he said was the wrong thing to say.
Tom dropped Mary off at the train station just before 2:30.
It was impossible for me to answer all of Tom\'s questions.
Are you sure we\'re doing what we\'re supposed to be doing?
This has been one of the driest years that we\'ve ever had.
Tom might\'ve believed you if you hadn\'t started laughing.
If I could speak French half as well as you, I\'d be happy.
